title: Rationale and design of the ELEANOR trial early aortic valve surgery versus watchful waiting strategy in severe asymptomatic aortic regurgitation, ACRONYM: ELEANOR
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Radka Kočková, Jan Vojáček, Helena Bedáňová, Petr Fila, Ivo Skalský, Daniela Žáková, Michal Klán, Barbora Míková, Karel Mědílek, Martin Tuna, Monika Fialová, Radka Dvořáková, Zuzana Hlubocká, Roman Panovský, Kryštof Slabý, Elayne Kelen de Oliveira, Filip Casselman, Martin Pěnička
